speech.line: Nothing in the couch cushions.
This door is also locked.
Guess this part of the simulation only covers this room.
Nothing in the couch cushions.
It's a familiar looking cabinet.
Hey.. there's some nice liquor in this cabinet.
Gah!
I placed the cocktail on the coaster.
It's a coaster with an embroidered 'N'.
Nothing on this table besides the coaster.
I.. think I remember liking them with a cherry.
'N' for Nathan..
These look like drawers, but I don't see how to open them.
It's Nathan's - well, my - grandfather's watch.
I think I'll leave it in its case.
No mysterious key in this one.
It's the king from the chessboard.. the most important piece.
It's an empty baby bottle.
I think I've emptied out the bookcase.
There's a pattern on this rug.
It's sort of a pentagon.. has five points, anyway.
It's another of these funny maps.
This button doesn't seem to be working right now.
This button doesn't seem to be working right now.
This button doesn't seem to be working right now.
This button doesn't seem to be working right now.
It says, 'Follow William'.
I clipped a piece of fern.
I don't think setting a plant on fire would help things.
I already took some fern.
The sign reads 'Woodwardia martinezii'.
It looks like some kind of fern.
The sign reads 'Woodwardia martinezii'.
That took care of the rust.
The cage door is rusted shut.
I can't pull it open with the rust there.
It's a small water bowl.
Gahh!
It's a coaster with an embroidered 'E'.
It's a cage for some sort of pet.
I.. don't know how I feel about this.
At least it's staying put where it is.
Gotcha.
Looks like the key broke off in the hole.
I can't reach it with my fingers.
I'll need the key to open this drawer.
It's the broken head of a key.
It's a pawn from the chessboard.
It's an arrow labelled with a 't'.
Five dots are drawn on this pad.
Looks pretty familiar.
There's a sequence of colors on the screen.
I think they're used for calibration.
The television is off.
I think it's some sort of smart TV.. I don't even see a button.
I'm starting to think I might be bad at technology.
It's a box of matches.
There's a set of symbols on this compass.
I don't think the ribbon has any ink on it.
The keys on this typewriter won't press down for me.
A white substance squeezed out of the leaf.
I'll just leave it in the mortar.
They mixed together into a dark liquid.
Hmm.. it just sort of broke up.
I'll leave it in there for now.
They mixed together into a dark liquid.
A dark substance squeezed out of the bulb.
I can crush something with this.
I think it's called a mortar and pestle.
Ok.. now I have fern paste.
I think I made some ink.
It's a slippery, oily substance.
I poured some vermouth into the bowl.
There's a coaster here, with the letter 'S'.
I can pour the contents of a glass into this sink.
It's a minibar with a few ingredients.
If I find recipe ingredients, I should place them here.
It's a recipe book.
Strange recipes.
There are grooves in the wood here.
It's some sort of plaque, but it's so grimy I can't make out what's on it.
This plaque is caked over with grease and dirt.
It's a snowflake-like pattern.
Alright, I got a fire going.
There's some firewood ready to be lit.
It looks like a cauldron over the fireplace.
Boiling the sap made a sticky glue.
The cauldron is empty.
The cauldron is empty.
It looks like a cauldron over the fireplace.
Ok.. I think that should hold.
I'll need both pieces to fix the key.
Ok.. I think that should hold.
I'll need both pieces to fix the key.
Already heated the milk.
Nice hot milk.
There's a pot of glue over the fire.
There's a fire in the fireplace.
There was a magnet stuck inside the grate.
Gah!
I clipped a small leaf from the plant.
I've already clipped some of this plant.
Maybe I'll need some more later.
I clipped a small leaf from the plant.
I've already clipped some of this plant.
It's a plant with small, shiny leaves.
The sign says it's 'Rhododendron williamsianum'.
It's a plant with small, shiny leaves.
The sign says it's 'Rhododendron williamsianum'.
I think it's for controlling light and humidity for plant samples.
I haven't used the last one I took yet.
Alright, one more plant cutting.
I don't think I need anymore for now.
Those grew pretty fast.
Those grew pretty fast.
It's an empty pack of seeds labeled 'Salvia verbenacia'.
I think they've already been planted in the machine here.
Lots of stuff for the minibar.
There's a snowflake-like pattern on this minifridge.
I've emptied out the fridge.
There's some sort of pattern or logo here.
There we go.
Hm..
It's a teddy bear with an embroidered 'W'.
I'll take this back.
Warm milk.
There's still something missing.
It's a chessboard with some pieces missing.
Looks like three pieces are missing.
It's a chessboard with some pieces missing.
Looks like two pieces are missing.
It's a chessboard with a piece missing.
I've reassembled the chess board.
Gah!
There are a few symbols on this picture.
That looks right.

lines.name: AvatarHelp
lines.line: How can I help you?

branch.name: Objective
branch.text: What am I supposed to be doing again?

lines.name: Objective1
lines.line: I'm not sure what I'm supposed to be doing.

lines.name: Objective2
lines.line: This simulation is designed to ease you back into your memories.

lines.name: Objective3
lines.line: Read anything you can find. Like the last room, there is much to understand about your waking life from this depiction.

branch.name: Direct
branch.text: Could you be more direct about what I can do?

lines.name: Direct1
lines.line: Could you be more direct about what I should be doing?

lines.name: Direct2
lines.line: It will be most beneficial to your recovering mind to discover your identity on your own.

lines.name: Direct3
lines.line: However, I can provide guidance in a limited capacity.

branch.name: Drawer2Hint
branch.text: I'm still not sure where I should start.

lines.name: Drawer2Hint1
lines.line: I'm still not sure where to begin.

lines.name: Drawer2Hint2
lines.line: Look around everywhere, read everything you can find.

lines.name: Drawer2Hint3
lines.line: The first thing you'll want to look at is the four-digit code on the drawer.

branch.name: Drawer2Hint2
branch.text: I don't know where to get the four-digit code.

lines.name: Drawer2Hint21
lines.line: I need help with the four-digit code.

lines.name: Drawer2Hint22
lines.line: The screenplay scrap in the fireplace gives you the first digit.

lines.name: Drawer2Hint23
lines.line: Two other notes in the room can help you with the rest. Make sure you read Mary's note, in the drawer below the drawer with the code.

branch.name: CabinetHint
branch.text: How can I open the cabinet with the star?

lines.name: CabinetHint1
lines.line: The star cabinet in this room doesn't work like the one from the cabin.

lines.name: CabinetHint2
lines.line: You'll need to press the buttons in a specific order for the door to unlock.

lines.name: CabinetHint3
lines.line: Look for a pattern with a geometric resemblance to a star.

branch.name: FrameHint
branch.text: What do the symbols on the wall mean?

lines.name: FrameHint1
lines.line: What are the symbols on the wall for?

lines.name: FrameHint2
lines.line: You should be able to find similar symbols elsewhere in the room.

lines.name: FrameHint3
lines.line: Ignore color and focus on shape.

branch.name: BookshelfHint
branch.text: What's going on with these books?

lines.name: BookshelfHint1
lines.line: What can I do with the books?

lines.name: BookshelfHint2
lines.line: Something in the room should guide your selection of books to press.

lines.name: BookshelfHint3
lines.line: To reset the shelf, simply walk away.

branch.name: MapHint
branch.text: What can I do with the map in the corner?

lines.name: MapHint1
lines.line: There's another map in this room, but it's already unlocked.

lines.name: MapHint2
lines.line: You'll be able to activate this map by solving other puzzles in the room.

lines.name: MapHint3
lines.line: You'll want to provide an appropriate drink for each of the four coasters (N, E, W, S).

branch.name: PlantHint
branch.text: What am I supposed to do with the plant trimmings?

lines.name: PlantHint1
lines.line: I'm carrying around plant material.

lines.name: PlantHint2
lines.line: Part of this room is designed for mixing and creation.

lines.name: PlantHint3
lines.line: Read the recipes. You may need to translate using something else.

branch.name: CageHint
branch.text: How do I get into the animal cage?

lines.name: CageHint1
lines.line: How do I get into the animal cage?

lines.name: CageHint2
lines.line: You'll need to mix up something that can get rid of that rust.

branch.name: SymbolsHint
branch.text: How can I open the drawer with the symbols?

lines.name: SymbolsHint1
lines.line: How can I get the right order of symbols for this drawer?

lines.name: SymbolsHint2
lines.line: Like the desk in the last room, the symbols are drawn on notes you can find.

lines.name: SymbolsHint3
lines.line: Some notes aren't yet accessible. Focus on other puzzles for now.

lines.name: SymbolsHint4
lines.line: You should be able to find what you need. Enter the symbols in chronological order.

branch.name: KeyBrokeHint
branch.text: How do I get the broken key out of the lock?

lines.name: KeyBrokeHint1
lines.line: How do I get the broken key out of the lock?

lines.name: KeyBrokeHint2
lines.line: The same way you retrieved the key last time.

lines.name: KeyBrokeHint3
lines.line: Look for something that can pull the piece from the lock.

branch.name: FernPasteHint
branch.text: What can I do with this white bottle?

lines.name: FernPasteHint1
lines.line: What can I do with the white paste from the fern?

lines.name: FernPasteHint2
lines.line: Read the recipes. You may be able to make something useful from the paste.

branch.name: TypewriterHint
branch.text: How do I use the typewriter?

lines.name: TypewriterHint1
lines.line: How do I use the typewriter?

lines.name: TypewriterHint2
lines.line: It's out of ink. Maybe you can mix some up.

branch.name: RecipeHint
branch.text: I don't understand these recipes.

lines.name: RecipeHint1
lines.line: I don't know how to interpret these recipes.

lines.name: RecipeHint2
lines.line: There's something around to translate the symbols. But you might be able to work them out without it.

lines.name: RecipeHint3
lines.line: Don't miss the mortar and pestle in the corner.

branch.name: RecipeHint2
branch.text: I need more help with the recipes.

lines.name: RecipeHint1
lines.line: I still can't interpret these recipes.

lines.name: RecipeHint2
lines.line: Each recipe has a double meaning. Pay attention to the initials of the ingredients.

lines.name: RecipeHint3
lines.line: Read the names of the plants and ingredients you've collected as well.

branch.name: SaraDrinkHint
branch.text: What does Sara drink?

lines.name: SaraDrinkHint1
lines.line: I can't get Sara's drink right.

lines.name: SaraDrinkHint2
lines.line: Remember that each recipe has two distinct interpretations.

lines.name: SaraDrinkHint3
lines.line: The fourth is torn, but you should have enough of a description to deduce its meaning.

branch.name: PlaqueHint
branch.text: How can I clean up the dirty plaque?

lines.name: PlaqueHint1
lines.line: How can I clean up the dirty plaque?

lines.name: PlaqueHint2
lines.line: You'll need to mix up something that can clean it up.

lines.name: PlaqueHint3
lines.line: Prepare the towel at the minibar appropriately. You'll be able to take it when it's been prepared.

branch.name: GrowerHint
branch.text: What do I do with the buttons on the purple machine?

lines.name: GrowerHint1
lines.line: How can I activate this plant machine?

lines.name: GrowerHint2
lines.line: You'll need to combine two pieces of information to get the right settings.

lines.name: GrowerHint3
lines.line: You don't yet have access to the right clues. Focus on other puzzles in the room.

lines.name: GrowerHint4
lines.line: Use the pad in the drawer with a color order you can find elsewhere.

branch.name: NeverMindHint
branch.text: Never mind

lines.name: NeverMind1
lines.line: Never mind.

branch.name: William
branch.text: What happened to William?

lines.name: William1
lines.line: What exactly happened to William?

lines.name: William2
lines.line: That conclusion is yours alone to determine.

lines.name: William3
lines.line: Why?

lines.name: William4
lines.line: As has been expressed, your subconscious fills this space with the things that have shaped it. Returning to your past life can only be acheived by reliving a form of that shaping.

lines.name: William5
lines.line: Your experiences cannot be dictated to you. They need to be experienced.

lines.name: William6
lines.line: ..ok, I guess I buy that.

branch.name: Exit
branch.text: Never mind.

lines.name: NeverMind
lines.line: Never mind.
